name: PCLinuxOS Xfce Comunity Remaster 2014.12
short_description:
PCLinuxOS Xfce Comunity Remaster is offered in both x86 and x86_64 architecture, each architecture in two variants:
- Full version which includes many useful and popular applications
User level: beginer, intermediate, advanced
- "Base" version which comes only with the basic system
User level: advanced

Passwords:
root   - root
guest - no password 

Features:
- kernel 3.18-1
Applications for the full version: 
- Archiving – xfburn, Peazip
- Disk management: Gparted
- Internet – Firefox web browser, Thunderbird e-mail client, TeamViewer, Skype, Pidgin, HexChat, Transmission, NitroShare, Great Little Radio
- Graphics – GIMP, ImageMagik, Ristretto image viewer, Simplescan, GColor3
- Multimedia – Deadbeef audio player,VLC media player, Camorama webcam viewer, DeVeDe
- Office – LibreOffice, AbiWord, Evince pdf reader, Gcalctool
And more...

Have fun! :)

Technical support site:
http://www.pclinuxos.com/forum/index.php
summary: PCLinuxOS remaster with Xfce desktop environment
